short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A start page for browsers with some costume options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimalist Start page with custom options for your browser 

Customization options:
*Background image
*Round Corners
*backdrop blur effect
*Background Blur
*Opacity
*Background Color
*12-hour clock
*Bookmark
*Timezone
